sentences.english: He mustered up enough courage to attack the difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 他鼓起足夠的勇氣去攻克難關。

sentences.english: How I wish governments of both Singapore and America can put in their concerted efforts to encourage recycling.
sentences.chinese: 多麼希望新加坡和美國的政府能克勤克難的推動環保。

sentences.english: Team work experience under the passion and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 體驗團隊共同攻克難關的激情和喜悅。
